title: Simulation-Based Instructional Design for Strengthening Analytical Thinking in Differential Equations

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of basic calculus and differential equation modeling
context.additional_context: Learners are interested in expressing real-world physical phenomena through differential equations, aiming to enhance problem-solving skills using graphical/numerical analysis tools

learning_goals: Students can interpret solutions to differential equations as function graphs and explain their physical meaning
Students can predict and analyze the numerical behavior of nonlinear differential equations using simulation tools
Students can evaluate and improve differential equation problem-solving strategies based on cases derived from task-based interviews
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
